posts.post_content: I have a very nice SGC 10 for sale.  It has four tiny pinholes in the corners, which accounts for the grade.  Asking $$$. Paypal is okay.  Back is clean.

im a bit interested in the johnson but cant do 275 for it. I saw recently one sell at an sgc grade of a 2 on ebay sell for $225. This is a nice card but still graded a 1. I could do $150 on it thats my top on it. If that would work let me know 

heres the link

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/1910-T206-Walter-Johnson-SGC-20-/140581934299?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item20bb5614db[/url]

kamikidEFFL-I'm sure you just overlooked the grade in the link you provided but it is SGC 20(1.5) not a 2.

By the way nice looking card David. Good luck with the sale.
my fault on the grade but still better grade and $50 cheaper. If your interested great if not oh well many cards out there i can spend it on haha

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/1909-T206-WALTER-JOHNSON-PORTRAIT-PSA-1-Super-LOW-Price-/130556269400?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item1e65c29358[/url]

The PSA 1 in the link above recently sold (with shipping) for $282.48, and its about 80/20 off-center to both left and top.  So $275 sounds too low!

Buy the card grasshopper, not the grade.

The PSA 1 in the link above recently sold (with shipping) for $282.48, and its about 80/20 off-center to both left and top.  So $275 sounds too low!

Buy the card grasshopper, not the grade.[/QUOTE]

Absolutely agree, buy the card and not the flip!!!!
Ill pass i really cant spend over 150 on it. I sometimes resell or trade up and i really cant buy it for much more than that

David, 

I will take the card if your pending sale does not happen


John
Me too and full price at that. LMK, thanks
Thanks everyone. The sale did go through.
